summary: FAZ 3.2 - Kullanıcı Bazlı Veri İzolasyonu testi tamamlandı. Tüm backend ve frontend testleri başarılı. User 1 (12 müşteri) ve User 2 (1 müşteri) arasında tam veri izolasyonu doğrulandı.
passed_tests: Authentication - User 1 login (test@example.com)
Authentication - User 2 login (user2@test.com)
Authentication - Invalid credentials rejected
Customer Isolation - User 1 sees 12 customers
Customer Isolation - User 2 sees 1 customer
Customer Isolation - No overlapping customer IDs
Customer Isolation - User 1 cannot access User 2's customers (404)
Customer Isolation - New customer assigned to creating user
Region Isolation - Users see only their own regions
Visit Isolation - Users see only their own visits
Follow-up Isolation - Users see only their own follow-ups
Vehicle Isolation - Users see only their own vehicles
Unauthorized Access - All endpoints require authentication (401)
CRUD Isolation - User cannot update another user's customer
CRUD Isolation - User cannot delete another user's customer
PDF Report - Endpoint accessible for authenticated user
Frontend - User 1 login and customer list display
Frontend - User 2 login and customer list display
Frontend - Add customer form works for User 2
Frontend - New customer visible only to creating user
seed_data_creation: Test customer 'TEST_User2_IsolationTest' was created and deleted during testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: FAZ 3.2 veri izolasyonu implementasyonu tamamlandı ve test edildi. Tüm CRUD endpoint'leri user_id filtresi ile korunuyor. İki test kullanıcısı mevcut: User 1 (12 müşteri) ve User 2 (1 müşteri). sessionStorage kullanılıyor, localStorage değil.
